Victor Jiao

Profile Projects Blog

Recent Projects

Starlorn - a space-themed bullet-hell game, where you play as a defending spaceship destroying opponents with strange, blue-glowy bullets whilst simultaneously dodging enemy ammunition.

Neighborhood - An app that helps you reach out to your neighbors in events and posts with a geo-centric system.

LeapAudio - An app that uses the LeapMotion to generate chords based on certain gestures.

Oriadnos - A texture mapper made from scratch with C/C++ and SDL and per- pixel access.

terminvaders - A terminal space shooter game with multiplayer capabilities. * Currently, the rendering for the menu needs to be fixed, but the game works otherwise.

databanks - A terminal data handler that retrieves and stores information as "index cards", complete with a find function and polished GUI.
